attributes.additional_details:
If this petition gets the 100,000 signatures for it to be debated in Parliament, it means that more people want a general election, than voted in a Conservative Leadership Contest.

If Rishi Sunak truly believes his plan is the right one, then let him put it to the people and give him a mandate
attributes.background: Theresa May called an election, as we the people hadn’t voted for  her to be PM. Boris Johnson also called an election for the same reason. This petition is asking Rishi Sunak to do the same so we can vote for PM

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
